forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High 62F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain later in the day. High 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning will give way to cloudy skies and light rain during the afternoon. High 48F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will transition to snow showers overnight. Low -2C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will give way to lingering snow showers overnight. Low 28F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early with showers developing later in the day. High 44F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
